caller_intent: The caller wants to add insurance for a stationary camper and resolve an outstanding auto insurance bill related to a deceased spouse's name on the policy.
resolution_steps: Agent Jeff collects camper details (location: Battle Ridge campground, ownership status: already purchased) and contact information (401-1916).
Agent notes the need to address an auto insurance bill and deceased spouse's name on the policy.
Agent checks the policy, confirms the bill amount ($1,243.17), and explains payment options.
Agent agrees to remove the deceased spouse from the policy and schedule a callback for the camper insurance.
Agent assures the caller someone will contact them shortly for next steps.
knowledge_required: Understanding driver eligibility and policy adjustments
summary: Johnny requested insurance for a stationary camper and discussed an auto insurance bill with a deceased spouse's name on the policy. The agent collected details, confirmed the bill amount, and agreed to remove the deceased driver while scheduling a callback for the camper insurance. The call concluded with a promise to follow up.
